00119 template <class InterfaceType>
00120 inline InterfaceType* CCompositeComponent::GetComponentInterface(const QByteArray& subId)
00121 {
00122        static istd::CClassInfo info(typeid(InterfaceType));
00123 
00124        return static_cast<InterfaceType*>(GetInterface(info, subId));
00125 }
